results.content:
I don't see why in learning course of FE framework I have to work with mySQL, also the design pattern is explained just briefly and does not explains the features of the pattern or how to leverage them. 

To me this is very frustrating.

Overall the speaker is taking big gaps between words so I am watching the curse on speed 1.25 - 1.50 to make up for that.

Some lessons contains up to a 1:30 min talking with no information relevant to framework which I consider bad as well.

Nevertheless this is so far the best course on the topic I have found as nobody is talking about JET online.

results.content: Ate agora básico que também tem na documentação

results.content: I found it very helpful to get started with OJET
